title: [HKUSPACE]召集所有太空人面孔(44) 太空回水之sem2繼續鬥請槍！！！！

replies.msg:
歡迎各位fm bb，有咩關於space嘅問題可以喺道問
year 2同老鬼都可以幫手答

Frequently Asked Questions: 

1.點DEFER學費? 
打封英文解釋信 
加埋offer letter+經濟困難證明文件+留位費收據既copy 
交份copy去space院校就得 
帶埋所有文件正本比人check 
之後返去等通知 
詳情可以打去space問 
by梵高的星夜 

2.咩係天書? 
係KEC十樓，有每年不同科升大學的數據，包括公開試成績，GPA，IELTS，interview問題 

3. SPACE最伏係邊幾科? 
沒有廢科，只有廢人 

4. 常用連結
https://learner.hkuspace.hku.hk/

交學費、add drop swap科、睇timetable、apply locker、download notes、交功課、reference letter、圖書館book 房、睇/買transcript、 withdraw from study全部經portal入到

港大附屬學院成績驕人 是你首選

1/3升讀三兩大
2/3升讀八大UGC



同學連SEM BREAK都不忘回校，手執書卷努力溫習，反映學術氣氛濃厚


關於killer......
唔少人都話space有killer，永遠榮譽太空人港英狗（戇鳩仔）咁講：


不過我自己咁睇，我覺得好多因素影響grade嘅，每個lecturer點都要派啲A+派啲B-，如果你嗰班多勁人，有對比之下你自然睇落差啲；相反你嗰班本身廢廢哋，而你水平又稍為高啲啲，assignment同present做得好啲，個A/A+自然袋袋平安。加埋出grade前每個lecturer比嘅grade都會微調，assignment A+final grade拉落A A-拉上A+都有，9分努力1分運氣，做好自己結果唔會太差嘅，唔對路咪add drop轉班囉。

唔好聽到人話某個lecturer教得好就狗衝（尤其中英文），入到去比成班英文啪啪聲嘅學霸堂堂屌打，出gdp嘅時候就欲哭無淚。某啲傳說中嘅killer無人reg，結果一個學霸都無，呢個就係你大顯身手嘅時候，多啲答問題問問題唔好怕醜，啲廢人一定笑鳩你多嘢講，你要記住平時分就係咁樣來，出gdp嗰陣你揸隻A佢揸隻B，睇下邊個笑到最後。同埋千祈唔好遲到同埋走堂，平時分執豆咁執，蘇州過後無艇搭，無咗呢10%話知你全部assignment A+ final grade都唔會上到A+。機會只係劉備勤力嘅人，做人做狗自己決定

*雖然最頂寫住「沒有廢科，只有廢人」，只係祖訓來架咋，EE(energy & environment)、AA(Art appreciation)、IPhil(Introduction to philosophy)呢三科係大伏，揀咗嘅自己睇路，drop科保平安

祝各位太空人早日返回地球

Dear Students,

Since the current coronavirus outbreak is likely to prevail in Hong Kong for a longer while, HKU SPACE Community College has decided to use the online platforms for the delivery of all instructional activities until further notice. Please note the following arrangements.

Lecture instruction of all classes will be delivered during the regular timetabled slots using online and mobile means. Unless absolutely necessary, there will be no scheduled face-to-face meetings on campus.

The revision days on 17-18 March and April 9 will be kept as scheduled. Individual teachers may use any of these three days to organize additional online learning activities. Please pay attention to announcements by the course teachers.

The assessment plans of many courses will likely be revised. Revisions in the assessment plan for individual courses will be announced on SOUL by Feb 21. The College will ensure flexibility in the course assessment and marking criteria for this semester.

The College will continue to provide counseling and student support service, as well as career and university programme talks via the SDCS hotline and the online platform.

The on-line instruction has been proceeding smoothly in general, though we received several comments from students about connectivity. The IT Unit of the School and our teachers are working diligently to improve the connection and delivery of the on-line lectures.

Hopefully classroom meetings can be resumed in April. To increase opportunity for direct face-to-face contacts and to enable make-ups of learning activities that must be done on campus, such as labs and practicals, the College has decided to implement the following arrangements.

The teaching schedule for the semester will be extended to May 9. During the extension period, classes will meet during the regular timetabled slots of the week.

The final examination period will be deferred to May 11-May 31, provided the outbreak has subsided by then. All students taking examinations are required to be present in the examination venue. Many courses, however, will likely replace the final examination by continuous assessment means.

replies.msg:
The College is considering offering a limited number of courses during the summer term to provide students who have had difficulties attending classes this semester with additional means of completing the graduation requirement.

Assessment results will be released by the end of June. We have been communicating with university admission offices to ensure that applications for direct entry by the Year 2 students will not be affected.

While most of our offices are currently kept open, anyone entering the campus is required to take a temperature measurement, wear a mouth mask, complete a health declaration form, and use hand-rub to sanitize the hands. Anyone showing symptoms of illness or returning from Mainland China within the past 14 days is not permitted to enter campus.

Please stay strong and healthy.

Professor Chan Lung Sang
College Principal

類似啲溝通時嘅文化差異，令到唔同國家嘅人除左語言障礙仲有文化同思想代溝，中間有therapy去解釋下有啲咩差異，係咩引致同點樣去解決同減低歧異，佢上堂會俾片我地睇，將日常生活嘅例子去解釋therapy。

尼科有mid term但無exam ，同埋有一份movie review 同一份essay，最尾有個gp project。

essay同group project會要求運用啲therapy，我記得上年個lecturer係鍾意你可以運用多啲實質例子去解釋therapy同埋要身分帶入 e.g. 你係旅遊發展局嘅成員，依家要做啲嘢去促進旅遊業，你就要代入入去係諗做嘅目的（唔好講得太表面，要講例如話有咩數據顯示香港旅遊人數有少少下降趨勢，所以為左仔吸引多啲人所以我啲研究尼個題目同提出原因同解決方案）同擺多啲方案example去講點做，咁樣佢會比較容易俾高分，我上年就係咁，project俾左at least80分

quote.msg: intercultural communication上堂會幾fun下，上年上嘅時候lecturer都有重點講啲concept，最尾A-左。但要攞A，科科都係要認真努力過先有可能

類似啲溝通時嘅文化差異，令到唔同國家嘅人除左語言障礙仲有文化同思想代溝，中間有therapy去解釋下有啲咩差異，係咩引致同點樣去解決同減低歧異，佢上堂會俾片我地睇，將日常生活嘅例子去解釋therapy。

尼科有mid term但無exam ，同埋有一份movie review 同一份essay，最尾有個gp project。

essay同group project會要求運用啲therapy，我記得上年個lecturer係鍾意你可以運用多啲實質例子去解釋therapy同埋要身分帶入 e.g. 你係旅遊發展局嘅成員，依家要做啲嘢去促進旅遊業，你就要代入入去係諗做嘅目的（唔好講得太表面，要講例如話有咩數據顯示香港旅遊人數有少少下降趨勢，所以為左仔吸引多啲人所以我啲研究尼個題目同提出原因同解決方案）同擺多啲方案example去講點做，咁樣佢會比較容易俾高分，我上年就係咁，project俾左at least80分

replies.msg: 個事實係最尾都係睇GPA簡傷心

Dear Students,

Following the decision by The University of Hong Kong to continue with delivery of all teaching and learning online for the rest of the Semester, please note the following arrangements for all CC programmes:

Instruction of all lectures will be delivered online till May 9, 2020.

There will be no examinations held physically in classrooms/exam halls; all assessments including end-of-term assessments will be done online.

For laboratory, studio or practical skills components of courses that need to be taught through face-to-face classes for some of the courses, the College will arrange for students to come to campus by groups to undertake the lab practice. When these students come on campus, they will be required to follow the College’s hygiene requirements such as wearing surgical masks at all times. For practicum that is normally done in a clinic or hospital or company, the programme coordinator will make announcement separately on the arrangement.

All courses, with the exception of a few experiential learning courses, will be marked on the basis of letter grades. There will be no PASS/FAIL option for assessment choice.

I have asked all teachers to review the assessment tasks to ensure they are suitable to be done online.

Please pay attention to the announcements on SOUL by course teachers or programme coordinators on specific arrangements.

The University and CC continue to monitor the situation of the current pandemic. Our priority is still the health and safety of our students and staff. We will try to find the best way forward to ensure our students receive the best learning opportunities given the circumstances.

Professor Chan Lung Sang
College Principal
